name: Events (Okta API)
description: The [Okta Events API](/docs/api/resources/events) provides read access to your organization's system log. The API is intended to export event data as a batch job from your organization to another system for reporting or analysis.

requests.name: Get events that occurred after the specified date
Get events for the specified user
Get events

requests.url: {{url}}/api/v1/events?limit=100&filter=action.objectType eq "app.auth.sso" and target.id eq "{{appId}}" and target.id eq "{{userId}}"
requests.name: Get events of the specified type for the specified app and user
Get events of the specified type that occurred after the specified date
